authors: CALIPHO team at SIB Swiss Institute of Bioinformatics

description: A BioJS 2.0 component to view protein structures

description: A graph visualisation tool for PSICQUIC servers

name: biojs-vis-pmccitation
description: For retrieving article metadata from Europe PMC (http://www.europepmc.org). Covers all of PubMed (updated daily) and 3 million full text articles and other sources. A single article or list view can be returned.

description: A t-SNE web visualisation for high dimensional data

description: Component to represent a chromosome with its bands

description: Graph theory (a.k.a. network) library for analysis and visualisation

name: biojs-vis-hgv
description: A BioJS component for human genetic variation viewer(protein variants).

name: expression-bar
description: Simple barchart to show expression levels across experiments

name: biojs-vis-hpafeature
description: Component to represent one summary feature. Originally design to display protein expression information from the Human Protein Atlas (HPA).

name: biojs-vis-proteome
description: A BioJS component for dynamic, multilevel visualisation of proteomes in UniProt.

name: biojs2galaxy
description: Continous integration of BioJS components into Galay

name: biojs-pcviz
description: BioJS wrapper for PCViz widget from Pathway Commons team

name: slush-biojs
description: A slush generator for BioJS modules

description: Convient tools to work with seqs

description: Nucleotide sequence manipulation and analysis library

name: gnomic-grammar
description: A grammar for describing microbial genotypes and phenotypes.

description: Interactive web heatmap viewer built with JavaScript

description: SAM format parser, with the hability to retrive regions from  a ws

description: renders a KEGGML file and displays a KEGG pathway

description: Parses newick strings into JSON and JSON into newick

description: A collection of adapters to combine the MSA and Tree component

name: stat.seqs
description: A module to analyze multiple seqs (information content, frequency, ...)

description: Displays the information available in the Open PHACTS Linked Data cache about a compound.
